publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2868 Colin Fox:Obscene Profits, Obscene Pay Offer—That the Parliament condemns the decision of the HSBC Bank to impose a below-inflation pay settlement on its staff, despite its record profits of £9.6 billion announced in February this year; notes that this will result in up to 10% of staff getting no pay rise at all this year and a further 45% getting a below-inflation pay rise; congratulates the union members in HSBC who have voted to take industrial action on Friday 27 May 2005, and believes that HSBC should reconsider its derisory offer and negotiate a fair pay settlement for staff.
